title: Update your email address
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: EmailAddress
fields.description: The requested new email address for a member. 50 characters or less.

fields.name: Password
fields.description: The user's password. This will be compared against the password of the authenticated user and an error will be returned if they are different.

returns.description: <UpdateEmailResponse> Success if the user's email address is updated.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.
